content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2(5), Tottenham Hotspur 2(3).
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Tottenham Hotspur 2.
Attempt saved. Son Heung-Min (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Attempt blocked. Anthony Georgiou (Tottenham Hotspur) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Christian Eriksen.
Attempt missed. Son Heung-Min (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Christian Eriksen with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Tottenham Hotspur. Conceded by Monchu.
Attempt blocked. Luke Amos (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Oliver Skipp.
Attempt missed. Ballou Jean-Yves Tabla (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Ricard Puig.
Attempt missed. Christian Eriksen (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Luke Amos.
Offside, Barcelona. Ballou Jean-Yves Tabla tries a through ball, but Abel Ruiz is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Davinson Sánchez (Tottenham Hotspur) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Christian Eriksen with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Tottenham Hotspur. Conceded by Jasper Cillessen.
Attempt saved. Christian Eriksen (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Anthony Georgiou.
Attempt saved. Ricard Puig (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Tottenham Hotspur. Conceded by Marc Cucurella.
Attempt blocked. Serge Aurier (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Christian Eriksen.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Tottenham Hotspur 2. Georges-Kévin Nkoudou (Tottenham Hotspur) left footed shot from very close range to the high centre of the goal.
Attempt blocked. Anthony Georgiou (Tottenham Hotspur) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Son Heung-Min.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Tottenham Hotspur 1. Son Heung-Min (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Christian Eriksen (Tottenham Hotspur) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Ben Davies (Tottenham Hotspur) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Tottenham Hotspur. Conceded by Abel Ruiz.
Oliver Skipp (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Sergi Palencia (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Ballou Jean-Yves Tabla replaces Carles Pérez.
Monchu (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Georges-Kévin Nkoudou (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Monchu (Barcelona).
Foul by Monchu (Barcelona).
Christian Eriksen (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Jorge Cuenca (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Malcom with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Michel Vorm.

Foul by Jorge Cuenca (Barcelona).
Christian Eriksen (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Malcom (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Anthony Georgiou (Tottenham Hotspur).
Substitution, Tottenham Hotspur. Anthony Georgiou replaces Lucas Moura.
Substitution, Tottenham Hotspur. Michel Vorm replaces Paulo Gazzaniga.
Attempt saved. Son Heung-Min (Tottenham Hotspur) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Christian Eriksen.

Lucas Moura (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Lucas Moura (Tottenham Hotspur) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Álex Collado (Barcelona).
Substitution, Tottenham Hotspur. Oliver Skipp replaces Fernando Llorente.
Second Half begins Barcelona 2, Tottenham Hotspur 0.
Substitution, Barcelona. Abel Ruiz replaces Munir El Haddadi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Monchu replaces Arthur.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Palencia replaces Nélson Semedo.
Substitution, Tottenham Hotspur. Davinson Sánchez replaces Kyle Walker-Peters.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jorge Cuenca replaces Clément Lenglet.
Substitution, Barcelona. Álex Collado replaces Sergi Roberto.

First Half begins.
Penalty Shootout ends, Barcelona 2(5), Tottenham Hotspur 2(3).
Goal!  Barcelona 2(5), Tottenham Hotspur 2(3). Malcom (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(4), Tottenham Hotspur 2(3). Davinson Sánchez (Tottenham Hotspur) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(4), Tottenham Hotspur 2(2). Ricard Puig (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty saved! Anthony Georgiou (Tottenham Hotspur) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(3), Tottenham Hotspur 2(2). Monchu (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(2), Tottenham Hotspur 2(2). Ben Davies (Tottenham Hotspur) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(2), Tottenham Hotspur 2(1). Abel Ruiz (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(1), Tottenham Hotspur 2(1). Son Heung-Min (Tottenham Hotspur) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Barcelona 2(1), Tottenham Hotspur 2. Sergi Palencia (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty Shootout begins Barcelona 2, Tottenham Hotspur 2.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
